about_the_game:
Dust Raiders – Demo

Welcome to the post-apocalyptic world of Dust Raiders! In this demo version, you'll learn the basics of managing your convoy, face your first groups of raiders, and begin building your legend in the ruthless wasteland.

🚗 Upgrade Your Vehicles – Modify your fleet to improve its efficiency in combat and exploration.
⚔️ Tactical Battles – Use strategy and cunning to defeat raiders hunting for your resources.
👥 Gather Your Crew – Recruit unique survivors to strengthen your rule over the wasteland.

Will you rise to power or be just another victim of the dust? Play the Dust Raiders demo now and find out!

Everything did not go according to plan. Sooner or later, being in control of the refinery could slip away from your hands. And well… It did. The deadly Sawblade attack took everything from you. Your friend, Victor, is gone. Fuel gone. Equipment gone. Crew members are gone. Time to assemble the first vehicle from scrap, gather a new crew, and get back on track. There is no time to waste because The Great Storm is coming.

The Dust Raiders demo offers you access to the first instance of the game in which you will visit many enclaves and try almost all the game mechanics, including trading, combat, and managing your caravan! Try your hand at the post-apocalyptic world of Dust Raiders, where sand, wind, and the fuel tank will be the most important factors determining your survival! Can you reach the bridge in 15 days and cross with your squad to further pursue the Sawblade?

Dynamic economy

Dust Raiders features a dynamic economic system with demand and supply, and random events that can affect the market. You'll need to decide strategically what goods to buy and sell to maximize your profits.
detailed_description:
Dust Raiders – Demo

Welcome to the post-apocalyptic world of Dust Raiders! In this demo version, you'll learn the basics of managing your convoy, face your first groups of raiders, and begin building your legend in the ruthless wasteland.

🚗 Upgrade Your Vehicles – Modify your fleet to improve its efficiency in combat and exploration.
⚔️ Tactical Battles – Use strategy and cunning to defeat raiders hunting for your resources.
👥 Gather Your Crew – Recruit unique survivors to strengthen your rule over the wasteland.

Will you rise to power or be just another victim of the dust? Play the Dust Raiders demo now and find out!

Everything did not go according to plan. Sooner or later, being in control of the refinery could slip away from your hands. And well… It did. The deadly Sawblade attack took everything from you. Your friend, Victor, is gone. Fuel gone. Equipment gone. Crew members are gone. Time to assemble the first vehicle from scrap, gather a new crew, and get back on track. There is no time to waste because The Great Storm is coming.

The Dust Raiders demo offers you access to the first instance of the game in which you will visit many enclaves and try almost all the game mechanics, including trading, combat, and managing your caravan! Try your hand at the post-apocalyptic world of Dust Raiders, where sand, wind, and the fuel tank will be the most important factors determining your survival! Can you reach the bridge in 15 days and cross with your squad to further pursue the Sawblade?

Dynamic economy

Dust Raiders features a dynamic economic system with demand and supply, and random events that can affect the market. You'll need to decide strategically what goods to buy and sell to maximize your profits.
name: Dust Raiders Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080

short_description: Step into the unforgiving wasteland in Dust Raiders, a strategic management game where survival is just the beginning. In this demo, you'll experience the first 15 days of gameplay, giving you a taste of the challenges and choices that shape your journey.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support
